meanings.definition: To collect money for a particular purpose, especially for a charity or organization.
meanings.sent1: We will fundraise for the animal shelter by selling cookies.
meanings.sent2: The school decided to fundraise for new playground equipment.
meanings.sent3: Let's fundraise for the library by hosting a book sale!
meanings.sent4: She managed to fundraise enough to support the local food bank.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to fundraise for the children's hospital, showing great generosity.

meanings.definition: The act of raising money for a cause or project.
meanings.sent1: The fundraise was a huge success, exceeding all expectations.
meanings.sent2: She organized a fundraise to help those affected by the natural disaster.
meanings.sent3: The annual fundraise event brought the community closer together.
meanings.sent4: The fundraise for the new community center was a team effort.
meanings.sent5: Attending the fundraise allowed people to contribute to a good cause.
